statements: SELECT * FROM room_service_orders WHERE order_status = 'processed'
SELECT guest_id, order_description FROM room_service_orders WHERE order_status = 'pending'
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM room_service_orders WHERE guest_id = '12345'
SELECT * FROM room_service_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM room_service_orders WHERE order_status = 'completed'
SELECT * FROM room_service_orders WHERE order_status = 'completed' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, guest_id, order_description FROM room_service_orders WHERE guest_id = '1234' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM room_service_orders WHERE order_description LIKE '%coffee%' AND order_status = 'pending' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT guest_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM room_service_orders GROUP BY guest_id ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT guest_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE(), order_date)) AS avg_days_since_order FROM room_service_orders GROUP BY guest_id HAVING avg_days_since_order < 30 ORDER BY avg_days_since_order ASC;
SELECT * FROM guest_orders;
SELECT order_id, order_details FROM guest_orders ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT guest_id, room_number FROM guest_orders WHERE order_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM billing_details WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT guest_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM billing_details GROUP BY guest_id;
SELECT * FROM guest_orders;
SELECT order_id, guest_id, order_status FROM guest_orders WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM guest_orders WHERE order_status = 'pending';
SELECT guest_id, room_number, total_amount FROM billing_details WHERE payment_status = 'paid';
SELECT order_id, order_details, order_status FROM guest_orders WHERE guest_id = 10 AND room_number = 201 ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM RoomServiceOrders;
SELECT guest_id, item_name, total_price FROM RoomServiceOrders ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT guest_name, room_number FROM Guests WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_name, quantity, total_price FROM RoomServiceOrders WHERE quantity > 3 ORDER BY total_price;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date, total_charge FROM Guests INNER JOIN BillingDetails ON Guests.guest_id = BillingDetails.guest_id ORDER BY total_charge DESC;
SELECT * FROM RoomServiceOrders;
SELECT order_id, item_name, quantity, total_price FROM RoomServiceOrders WHERE total_price > 100 ORDER BY total_price DESC;

SELECT g.guest_name, r.item_name, r.quantity, b.total_charge FROM Guests g JOIN RoomServiceOrders r ON g.guest_id = r.guest_id JOIN BillingDetails b ON g.guest_id = b.guest_id WHERE b.total_charge > 200 ORDER BY b.total_charge ASC;

SELECT r.item_name, r.quantity, b.total_charge, g.guest_name FROM Guests g JOIN RoomServiceOrders r ON g.guest_id = r.guest_id JOIN BillingDetails b ON g.guest_id = b.guest_id WHERE r.quantity > 2 ORDER BY r.quantity DESC, b.total_charge ASC;

SELECT r.item_name, r.quantity, b.total_charge, g.guest_name FROM Guests g JOIN RoomServiceOrders r ON g.guest_id = r.guest_id JOIN BillingDetails b ON g.guest_id = b.guest_id WHERE b.room_charge > 50 AND b.service_charge > 20 ORDER BY b.total_charge DESC;
SELECT * FROM RoomServiceOrders;
SELECT guest_id, order_date, item_name FROM RoomServiceOrders WHERE quantity > 1;
SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date FROM Guests ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity_available, price_per_unit FROM RoomInventory WHERE quantity_available > 0 ORDER BY price_per_unit ASC;
SELECT guest_id, total_amount FROM BillingDetails WHERE bill_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM RoomServiceOrders WHERE quantity > 5
SELECT guest_id, order_date, item_name FROM RoomServiceOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM RoomServiceOrders GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_quantity > 10
SELECT r.item_name, r.price_per_unit, ri.quantity_available FROM RoomServiceOrders r JOIN RoomInventory ri ON r.item_name = ri.item_name
SELECT g.guest_name, b.total_amount FROM Guests g JOIN BillingDetails b ON g.guest_id = b.guest_id
SELECT * FROM RoomServiceOrders;
SELECT guest_id, order_date, order_price FROM RoomServiceOrders WHERE order_price > 50;
SELECT order_id, order_details FROM RoomServiceOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BillingDetails WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM Guests WHERE guest_id = 3;
SELECT order_id, guest_id, order_date FROM RoomServiceOrders WHERE order_price > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM BillingDetails WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY check_in_date ASC, check_out_date ASC;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, guest_phone FROM Guests WHERE guest_email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY guest_name;
SELECT room_number, room_type FROM Rooms WHERE room_type = 'Suite' ORDER BY room_number;
SELECT staff_name, role, staff_email FROM Staff WHERE role IN ('Manager', 'Supervisor') ORDER BY staff_name DESC;
